thread.title: RIDGE-LANE Limited Partners Expands Team & Business Lines

title: RIDGE-LANE Limited Partners Expands Team & Business Lines

organizations.name: ridge-lane limited partners expands team & business lines

text:
WASHINGTON, Feb. 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Former Governor of Pennsylvania and first Secretary of U.S. Department of Homeland Security, Thomas J. Ridge, and financier R. Brad Lane announce the expansion of their social-impact merchant-bank, RIDGE-LANE Limited Partners, with new business units in Sustainability, Education, and Information Technology, as well as additional Partners and Advisors.
"I am excited to have such distinguished leaders join us" said Governor Ridge, "as we expand the company in support of our mission to drive positive outcomes in society, at the intersection of private innovation, investment capital, and government. We are proud to announce our new team members."

THE COMPANY
RIDGE-LANE Limited Partners is a social-impact merchant bank with a team of General Partners, Operating Partners, and Senior Advisors who have served at the highest levels of business, finance, and government. RIDGE-LANE LP structures public-private partnerships to finance social infrastructure and urban development projects across the U.S., as well as advisory to venture capital funds and corporate development services to commercialize and scale private technology companies across the globe.
With offices in New York City, Washington DC and Palo Alto, RIDGE-LANE LP is a triple-bottom-line business that creates social impact and economic value by bridging the gap between the public and private sector, serving as a strategic partner to innovative companies through each phase of their growth - from ideation, to design, strategy and execution - leveraging our relationships and expertise to ensure our client's market penetration and success.
